00058 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00059 #include <config.h>
00060 #include <stdlib.h>
00061 #include <string.h>
00062 #include <library/io.h>
00063 
00064 /*
00065  *      graph =
00066  *              root node* arc*
00067  *      node =
00068  *              (node (id %d) (type %d) (status %d) (weight %f) (ext ...))
00069  *      arc = 
00070  *              (arc (src %d) (dest %d) (type %d) (weight %f) (ext ...))
00071  *      root =
00072  *              (root node_id%d (ext ...))
00073  *
00074  *      ... are passed to the ext_handlers.
00075  */
00076 void *(*graph_ext_handler) (LIST) = 0;
00077 void *(*node_ext_handler) (LIST) = 0;
00078 void *(*arc_ext_handler) (LIST) = 0;
00079 
00080 int (*graph_ext_output) (_GraphExtension, FILE *) = 0;
00081 int (*node_ext_output) (_NodeExtension, FILE *) = 0;
00082 int (*arc_ext_output) (_ArcExtension, FILE *) = 0;
00083 
00084 static void
00085 Punt (char *mesg)
00086 {
00087   fprintf (stderr, "Error in io.c: %s\n", mesg);
00088   exit (1);
00089 }
00090 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00091 static void
00092 DecodeRoot (LIST Largs, FGraph graph)
00093 {
00094   LIST Lid, Lopcode, Lpars;
00095   Node root;
00096   char *opcode;
00097   int id;
00098   Lid = Largs;
00099   if ((Lid == 0) || (NodeType (Lid) != T_INT))
00100     Punt ("illegal (root) descriptor");
00101   id = IntegerOf (Lid);
00102   Lpars = SiblingOf (Lid);
00103   /*
00104    *  Find the node(id)
00105    */
00106   root = FindNode (graph, id);
00107   if (root == 0)
00108     {
00109       root = NewNode ();
00110       nodeId (root) = id;
00111       AddNode (graph, root);
00112     }
00113   graph->root = root;
00114   for (Largs = SiblingOf (Largs); Largs != 0; Largs = SiblingOf (Largs))
00115     {
00116       if (NodeType (Largs) != T_LIST)
00117         continue;
00118       Lopcode = ChildOf (Largs);
00119       if ((Lopcode == 0) || (NodeType (Lopcode) != T_ID))
00120         continue;
00121       opcode = StringOf (Lopcode);
00122       Lpars = SiblingOf (Lopcode);
00123       if (!strcmp (opcode, "ext"))
00124         {
00125           if (graph_ext_handler != 0)
00126             graph->extension = (*graph_ext_handler) (Lpars);
00127         }
00128     }
00129 }
00130 static void
00131 DecodeNode (LIST Largs, FGraph graph)
00132 {
00133   LIST Lopcode, Lpars;
00134   Node node;
00135   char *opcode;
00136   node = 0;
00137   for (; Largs != 0; Largs = SiblingOf (Largs))
00138     {
00139       if (NodeType (Largs) != T_LIST)
00140         continue;
00141       Lopcode = ChildOf (Largs);
00142       if ((Lopcode == 0) || (NodeType (Lopcode) != T_ID))
00143         continue;
00144       opcode = StringOf (Lopcode);
00145       Lpars = SiblingOf (Lopcode);
00146       if (!strcmp (opcode, "id"))
00147         {
00148           int n_id;
00149           if ((Lpars == 0) || (NodeType (Lpars) != T_INT))
00150             continue;
00151           n_id = IntegerOf (Lpars);
00152           if ((node = FindNode (graph, n_id)) == 0)
00153             {
00154               node = NewNode ();
00155               nodeId (node) = n_id;
00156               AddNode (graph, node);
00157             }
00158         }
00159       else if (!strcmp (opcode, "type"))
00160         {
00161           if (node == 0)
00162             Punt ("illegal (node) descriptor 1");
00163           if ((Lpars == 0) || (NodeType (Lpars) != T_INT))
00164             continue;
00165           nodeType (node) = IntegerOf (Lpars);
00166         }
00167       else if (!strcmp (opcode, "status"))
00168         {
00169           if (node == 0)
00170             Punt ("illegal (node) descriptor 1");
00171           if ((Lpars == 0) || (NodeType (Lpars) != T_INT))
00172             continue;
00173           nodeStatus (node) = IntegerOf (Lpars);
00174         }
00175       else if (!strcmp (opcode, "weight"))
00176         {
00177           if (node == 0)
00178             Punt ("illegal (node) descriptor 1");
00179           if ((Lpars == 0) || (NodeType (Lpars) != T_REAL))
00180             continue;
00181           nodeWeight (node) = RealOf (Lpars);
00182         }
00183       else if (!strcmp (opcode, "ext"))
00184         {
00185           if (node == 0)
00186             Punt ("illegal (node) descriptor 1");
00187           if (node_ext_handler != 0)
00188             nodeExt (node) = (*node_ext_handler) (Lpars);
00189         }
00190       else
00191         {
00192           /* do nothing */
00193         }
00194     }
00195 }
00196 static void
00197 DecodeArc (LIST Largs, FGraph graph)
00198 {
00199   LIST Lopcode, Lpars;
00200   char *opcode;
00201   int src_id, dest_id, type;
00202   double weight;
00203   Node node, src_node = NULL, dest_node = NULL;
00204   void *extension = NULL;
00205   Arc arc;
00206   src_id = dest_id = type = 0;
00207   weight = 0.0;
00208   for (; Largs != 0; Largs = SiblingOf (Largs))
00209     {
00210       if (NodeType (Largs) != T_LIST)
00211         continue;
00212       Lopcode = ChildOf (Largs);
00213       if ((Lopcode == 0) || (NodeType (Lopcode) != T_ID))
00214         continue;
00215       opcode = StringOf (Lopcode);
00216       Lpars = SiblingOf (Lopcode);
00217       if (!strcmp (opcode, "src"))
00218         {
00219           if ((Lpars == 0) || (NodeType (Lpars) != T_INT))
00220             continue;
00221           src_id = IntegerOf (Lpars);
00222           if ((node = FindNode (graph, src_id)) == 0)
00223             {
00224               node = NewNode ();
00225               nodeId (node) = src_id;
00226               AddNode (graph, node);
00227             }
00228           src_node = node;
00229         }
00230       else if (!strcmp (opcode, "dest"))
00231         {
00232           if ((Lpars == 0) || (NodeType (Lpars) != T_INT))
00233             continue;
00234           dest_id = IntegerOf (Lpars);
00235           if ((node = FindNode (graph, dest_id)) == 0)
00236             {
00237               node = NewNode ();
00238               nodeId (node) = dest_id;
00239               AddNode (graph, node);
00240             }
00241           dest_node = node;
00242         }
00243       else if (!strcmp (opcode, "type"))
00244         {
00245           if ((Lpars == 0) || (NodeType (Lpars) != T_INT))
00246             continue;
00247           type = IntegerOf (Lpars);
00248         }
00249       else if (!strcmp (opcode, "weight"))
00250         {
00251           if ((Lpars == 0) || (NodeType (Lpars) != T_REAL))
00252             continue;
00253           weight = RealOf (Lpars);
00254         }
00255       else if (!strcmp (opcode, "ext"))
00256         {
00257           if (arc_ext_handler != 0)
00258             extension = (*arc_ext_handler) (Lpars);
00259         }
00260       else
00261         {
00262           /* do nothing */
00263         }
00264     }
00265   /*
00266    *  Insert arc into the graph.
00267    */
00268   ConnectNodes (src_node, dest_node, type);
00269   arc = FindSrcArc (src_node, dest_node, type);
00270   arcWeight (arc) = weight;
00271   arcExt (arc) = extension;
00272   arc = FindDestArc (src_node, dest_node, type);
00273   arcWeight (arc) = weight;
00274   arcExt (arc) = extension;
00275 }
00276 /*
00277  *      Read the graph specification from a file,
00278  *      construct a graph structure, and return
00279  *      a pointer to the root of the graph (the first node)
00280  */
00281 FGraph ReadGraph (char *file_name)
00282 {
00283   FGraph graph;
00284   LIST node;
00285   FILE *F;
00286   if (!strcmp (file_name, "stdin"))
00287     {
00288       F = stdin;
00289     }
00290   else
00291     {
00292       F = fopen (file_name, "r");
00293     }
00294   if (F == 0)
00295     Punt ("ReadGraph: cannot open file");
00296   graph = NewGraph ();          /* create a new graph */
00297   SwitchFile (F);
00298   while ((node = GetNode ()) != 0)
00299     {
00300       if (NodeType (node) == T_EOF)
00301         break;
00302       if (NodeType (node) == T_LIST)
00303         {
00304           LIST opcode, args;
00305           char *opc;
00306           opcode = ChildOf (node);
00307           if ((opcode == 0) || (NodeType (opcode) != T_ID))
00308             goto SKIP;
00309           opc = StringOf (opcode);
00310           args = SiblingOf (opcode);
00311           if (!strcmp (opc, "root"))
00312             {
00313               DecodeRoot (args, graph);
00314             }
00315           else if (!strcmp (opc, "node"))
00316             {
00317               DecodeNode (args, graph);
00318             }
00319           else if (!strcmp (opc, "arc"))
00320             {
00321               DecodeArc (args, graph);
00322             }
00323           else
00324             goto SKIP;
00325         }
00326     SKIP:
00327       DisposeNode (node);
00328     }
00329   return graph;
00330 }
00331 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00332 /*
00333  *      Write a graph structure to a file.
00334  */
00335 void
00336 WriteGraph (char *file_name, FGraph graph)
00337 {
00338   FILE *F;
00339   Node nptr;
00340   Arc aptr;
00341   if (!strcmp (file_name, "stdout"))
00342     {
00343       F = stdout;
00344     }
00345   else if (!strcmp (file_name, "stderr"))
00346     {
00347       F = stderr;
00348     }
00349   else
00350     {
00351       F = fopen (file_name, "w");
00352     }
00353   if (F == 0)
00354     Punt ("WriteGraph: cannot open file");
00355   if (graph == 0)
00356     return;
00357   /*
00358    *  root
00359    */
00360   if (graph->root != 0)
00361     {
00362       fprintf (F, "(root %d", nodeId (graph->root));
00363       if (graph_ext_output != 0)
00364         (*graph_ext_output) (graph->extension, F);
00365       fprintf (F, ")\n");
00366     }
00367   /*
00368    *  node*
00369    */
00370   for (nptr = graph->nodes; nptr != 0; nptr = nextNode (nptr))
00371     {
00372       fprintf (F, "(node (id %d)(type %d)(status %d)(weight %f)",
00373                nodeId (nptr), nodeType (nptr), nodeStatus (nptr),
00374                nodeWeight (nptr));
00375       if (node_ext_output != 0)
00376         (*node_ext_output) (nodeExt (nptr), F);
00377       fprintf (F, ")\n");
00378     }
00379   /*
00380    *  arc*
00381    */
00382   for (nptr = graph->nodes; nptr != 0; nptr = nextNode (nptr))
00383     {
00384       for (aptr = destinationArcs (nptr); aptr != 0; aptr = nextArc (aptr))
00385         {
00386           fprintf (F, "(arc (src %d)(dest %d)(type %d)(weight %f)",
00387                    nodeId (sourceNode (aptr)),
00388                    nodeId (destinationNode (aptr)),
00389                    arcType (aptr), arcWeight (aptr));
00390           if (arc_ext_output != 0)
00391             (*arc_ext_output) (arcExt (aptr), F);
00392           fprintf (F, ")\n");
00393         }
00394     }
00395   fflush (F);
00396   if ((F != stdout) && (F != stderr))
00397     fclose (F);
00398 }
00399 
00400 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00401 #ifdef DEBUG_IO
00402 main ()
00403 {
00404   FGraph g;
00405   g = ReadGraph ("stdin");
00406   WriteGraph ("stdout", g);
00407 }
00408 #endif
